Package.name: A3AExtender

Key.Original: The Official Antistasi Community and Barbolani

Package.Container:
Example of mission info: String uses in description.exe: briefingName = $STR_A3AE_maps_${worldname}_mapname; OnLoadName = $STR_A3AE_maps_${worldname}_mapname_short; OnLoadMission = $STR_A3AE_maps_${worldname}_loadText; overviewText = $STR_A3AE_maps_${worldname}_description;
$STR_A3AE_maps_${worldname}_mapname is used for config.cpp CfgMissions entry for the world and mission.sqm briefingName entry cfgPaths: CfgMissions >> MPMissions >> Antistasi_${worldname} >> briefingName Mission >> Intel >> briefingName
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
Antistasi Altis
Antistasi - Liberation of Altis
Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything.
Because nothing is more important than Freedom.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// </-->
Antistasi Mexico Extender
Antistasi - Liberation of Altis + mexican factions
Be the Resistance Leader. Fight against a superior enemy in technology, number, assets and vehicles. Use guerrilla tactics in a totally dynamic world, with around 18 sidemissions, everywhere, anytime, anything. + mexican factions included
Because nothing is more important than fun
